name: Ernest's Bar
description:
Ernest's Bar

Ernest's Bar is a game developed for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Hi and welcome, you are our new bartender at the Ernest's Bar ! Serve your customers using your dice.

How to play

Each time you roll a dice a new ingredient is on one side, you can roll as many times as you want, but don't take too much time or the customiers will leave !

If you click on the "Roll" button, all the dice will be roll, however if you click on a dice it will be locked and could not be reroll.

The "Send" button send all your locked dices. If you've got one or more combination you will increase your score, however the dice that don't match will needs to be reroll, so don't forget to unlock some dice before you send !

1 order = 5 points
2 orders = 15 points
3 orders = 25 points

Oh and yes, there is an online scoreboard !
